mapper.sql: question_lib_id, question_lib_level, question_lib_name, question_lib_author_id, question_lib_create_time, question_lib_tag_id, question_lib_mark, question_lib_url
mapper.insert: insert into sq_question_lib(question_lib_level, question_lib_name, question_lib_author_id, question_lib_create_time, question_lib_tag_id, question_lib_mark, question_lib_url) value (#{lib.questionLibLevel}, #{lib.questionLibName}, #{lib.questionLibAuthorId}, #{lib.questionLibCreateTime}, #{lib.questionLibTagId}, #{lib.questionLibMark}, #{lib.questionLibUrl});
